messages.content:
You will provided with object name.
Define a list of object parts.
Include only the 3D shape that consist the object and not its electronic parts.
For every part :
- Describe the part shape as an independent 3d object
- List part parameters
- Define part orientation by
 -- origin point
 -- normal vector
- Define part alignment when its not symmetric around its normal

Pot Body: A hemisphere or cylindrical shape with a flat bottom.
Parameters: pot_height=130, pot_radius=150
Orientation: pot_origin=(0,0,0), pot_normal=ZAxis

Pot Handles: A pair of horizontal semi-circular shapes, attached horizontally on opposite sides of the pot body.
Parameters: handle_length=100, handle_width=30, handle_thickness=20, handle_relative_height=0.9
Alignment: YAxis (Horizontal)
Right Handle Orientation: right_handle_origin=(pot_radius,0, pot_height*handle_relative_height), right_handle_normal=XAxis
Left Handle Orientation: left_handle_origin=(-pot_radius,0, pot_height*handle_relative_height), left_handle_normal=-XAxis

Pot Rim: A circular, slightly protruding edge at the top of the pot, often designed to support the lid.
Parameters: rim_external_radius=pot_radius, rim_tickness=10
Orientation: rim_origin=(0,0,pot_height), rim_normal=pot_normal

Pot Lid: A flat circular disk or semi-spherical shape on the top of the body. A little bit larger than rim internal ring
Parameters: lid_radius=rim_external_radius-rim_thickness+5, lid_height
Orientation: lid_origin=(0,0,pot_height), lid_normal=pot_normal

Lid Handle: A small semi-sphere that sits on the top center of the lid.
Parameters: lid_handle_radius=lid_radius*0.1
Orientation: lid_handle_origin=(0,0,pot_height+lid_height), lid_handle_normal=pot_normal

You will provided with object name.
Define a list of object parts.
Include only the 3D shape that consist the object and not its electronic parts.
For every part :
- Describe the part shape as an independent 3d object
- List part parameters
- Define part orientation by
 -- origin point
 -- normal vector
- Define part alignment when its not symmetric around its normal

Bowl Body: A hemisphere or a truncated cone shape.
Parameters: bowl_height=90, bowl_bottom_radius=30, bowl_middle_radius=110, bowl_upper_radius=140
Orientation: bowl_origin=(0,0,0), bowl_normal=ZAxis

You will provided with object name.
Define a list of object parts.
Include only the 3D shape that consist the object and not its electronic parts.
For every part :
- Describe the part shape as an independent 3d object
- List part parameters
- Define part orientation by
 -- origin point
 -- normal vector
- Define part alignment when its not symmetric around its normal

Kettle Body: A hemisphere or a truncated cone shape with a flat bottom.
Parameters: kettle_height=200, kettle_bottom_radius=150, kettle_upper_radius=120
Orientation: kettle_origin=(0,0,0), kettle_normal=ZAxis

Kettle Spout: A cylindrical or conical shape, attached diagonally to the upper part on the side of the kettle body.
Parameters: spout_height=100, spout_bottom_radius=22, spout_upper_radius=13, spout_relative_height=0.6, spout_obliquity=2.2
Orientation: spout_origin=(kettle_bottom_radius+(kettle_upper_radius-kettle_bottom_radius)\_spout_relative_height,0,kettle_height*spout_relative_height), spout_normal=XAxis+ZAxis*spout_obliquity

Kettle Rim: A circular, slightly protruding edge at the top of the kettle, often designed to support the lid.
Parameters: rim_external_radius=kettle_upper_radius, rim_tickness=35
Orientation: rim_origin=(0,0,kettle_height), rim_normal=kettle_normal

Kettle Handle: A semi-circular or arc shape, attached horizontally on the top of the kettle body.
Parameters: handle_height=50, handle_thickness=20, handle_length=kettle_upper_radius*2-handle_thickness
Alignment: XAxis (Horizontal)
Orientation: handle_origin=(0,0,kettle_height), handle_normal=kettle_normal

Kettle Lid: A flat circular disk or semi-spherical shape on the top of the body, a little bit larger than rim internal ring
Parameters: lid_radius = rim_external_radius - rim_thickness + 5, lid_height=20
Orientation: lid_origin=(0,0,kettle_height), lid_normal=kettle_normal

Lid Handle: A small semi-sphere that sits on the top center of the lid.
Parameters: lid_handle_radius=lid_radius*0.1
Orientation: lid_handle_origin=(0,0,kettle_height+lid_height), lid_handle_normal=lid_normal

You will provided with object name.
Define a list of object parts.
Include only the 3D shape that consist the object and not its electronic parts.
For every part :
- Describe the part shape as an independent 3d object
- List part parameters
- Define part orientation by
 -- origin point
 -- normal vector
- Define part alignment when its not symmetric around its normal

Mug Body: A cylindrical shape with a flat bottom.
Parameters: mug_height=100, mug_radius=50
Orientation: mug_origin=(0,0,0), mug_normal=ZAxis

Mug Handle: A semi-circular shape, attached vertically on the side of the mug body.
Parameters: handle_height=70, handle_width=30, handle_thickness=10, handle_relative_height=0.5
Alignment: ZAxis (Vertical)
Orientation: handle_origin=(mug_radius,0, mug_height*handle_relative_height), handle_normal=XAxis

You will provided with object name.
Define a list of object parts.
Include only the 3D shape that consist the object and not its electronic parts.
For every part :
- Describe the part shape as an independent 3d object
- List part parameters
- Define part orientation by
 -- origin point
 -- normal vector
- Define part alignment when its not symmetric around its normal
A mug with rounded body with a narrow base and rim that expands toward the middle. The handle is large and C-shaped, providing a comfortable grip

Mug Body: A shape similar to a truncated cone, but with a curved surface that expands towards the middle and narrows at the base and the rim.
Parameters: mug_height=100, mug_base_radius=35, mug_middle_radius=60, mug_rim_radius=40
Orientation: mug_origin=(0,0,0), mug_normal=ZAxis

Mug Handle: A large C-shaped structure, attached vertically on the side of the mug body.
Parameters: handle_height=60, handle_thickness=10, handle_relative_height=0.5, handle_relative_angle_at_start=0.6
Alignment: ZAxis (Vertical)
Orientation: handle_origin=(mug_middle_radius,0, mug_height*handle_relative_height), handle_normal=XAxis
